title: Riot Direct

embed.description: To get more tech help, tools, and info, visit support.riotgames.com Whenever you do anything in League, a miraculous technological journey begins where everything can go horribly wrong. Professor Milk and Riot Player Support present the story of what happens when you press Q.

body:
Hi Riot,

Thanks to the video you shared on the OCE client overview page, I'm now informed about 'Riot Direct'.  So I  know that 'Riot Direct' exists in other continents but does it exist in Australia? If so how do we find out which ISP's are on board?

Thanks very much for your help.

replies.body: I love how helpful rioters are.
I would also very  much like these answers.
